import React from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col, ListGroup, ListGroupItem } from "reactstrap"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "../../styles/footer.css"; const quickLinks = [ { path: "/about", display: "About", }, { path: "#", display: "Privacy Policy", }, { path: "/gems", display: "Gems Listing", }, { path: "/blogs", display: "Blog", }, { path: "/contact", display: "Contact", }, ]; const Footer = () => { const date = new Date(); const year = date.getFullYear(); return (
